overview.en: Lgame Studio：Founded by a group of blockchain enthusiasts and geeks from Taiwan, Lgame is committed to building a global chain ecology with tens of millions users, providing platform users with better gaming experience.
overview.zh: 鏈遊工作室：由一群來自台灣的區塊鏈愛好者與精通區塊鏈技術的極客共同組建，致力建立全球化生態鏈運營體系，打造一個千萬級的用戶生態圈，為不同平台用戶提供更好的遊戲體驗。
